title: "Healthcare leaders depend on 7 AI and analytics vendors most amid COVID-19"
excerpt: "KLAS released a new report detailing the health IT vendors and solutions healthcare providers count on most during the pandemic. The firm surveyed 192 healthcare leaders and received 174 responses, including several who mentioned relying on artificial intelligence and analytics vendors the most outside of telehealth vendors."
